item.question: Community property is owned by:
item.choiceC: the heirs of the deceased owner

item.question: The principle of ownership which mandates property owners to use their property in a manner that will promote not only their interest but also the general welfare is known as:
Under the rule on conflict of interest of MO39 s.1985 as amended, the engagement of the services of a real estate appraiser must not be:
item.choiceA: subject of listing in a telephone directory
item.choiceD: based on the experience of the appraiser

item.question: Application for the renewal of a real estate license must be accompanied with
item.choiceC: Certificate of Guarantee from recognized national real estate association.

item.question: Under no circumstance may a real estate broker:
item.choiceA: receive commission from both seller or buyer
item.choiceC: sell the principal's representative to a relative
